title: INNOTECHOLIVA Launches New Advisory Service for Sustainable Farming
summary: We are thrilled to announce our new consulting division focused on helping olive groves transition to fully sustainable and organic farming practices, improving soil health and biodiversity.

title: Our CEO to Speak at the International Olive Oil Symposium
summary: Our lead consultant will be a keynote speaker at the upcoming global symposium, discussing the impact of new technologies on virgin olive oil quality.

title: A Record-Breaking Year for Quality
summary: Clients who implemented our quality assurance protocols have reported a 25% increase in premium-grade olive oil production this harvest season. We celebrate their success.
